snippet.title: Dark Light Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Early Access Available on Steam from May 8th 2020!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1134520/Dark_Light/
Dark Light is a Sci-fi 2D action-platformer, metroidvania, souls-like inspired game. Explore apocalypse cyberpunk world full of supernatural beings. Encounter and defeat creatures of darkness which are invisible to the naked eye, detected only with the light source of your drone.
